  "Broker Comment" : "CUSTOMER SUED PARTNERSHIP FOR ACTIVITES RELATED TO ITS LENDING PRACTICES.  IN ANSWERING THE LAWSUIT, PARTNERSHIP INCLUDED PROSPERA AS A THIRD-PARTY DEFENDANT IN AN ATTEMPT TO INVOKE THE MANDATORY VENUE AND ARBITRATION REQUIREMENTS OF OTHER AGREEMENTS BETWEEN THE PLAINTIFFS & DEFENDANTS, AND BETWEEN DEFENDANTS, CUSTOMERS & PROSPERA.  THE THIRD-PARTY CLAIM ALLEGES THAT \"PART OF THE NEGLIGENCE THAT WAS COMMITTED AND/OR FRAUD THAT WAS PERPETRATED ON PLAINTIFFS WAS COMMITTED/PERPETRATED BY [PROSPERA'S] SALES AGENT IN FORT BEND COUNTY, TEXAS IN DISTRIBUTING THEIR SALES LITERATURE TO ONE OR MORE OF THE PLAINTIFF'S THERE.\"  REP WAS NOT NAMED IN THE PLEADING OR IN THE DOCUMENT, BUT FIRM HAS DETERMINED THAT HE IS THE REP OF RECORD FOR THE CUSTOMERS INVOLVED."
}
